name: Dragon Trail
description:
Hi everyone,

I'm a young boy who learned bunch of stuff by himself and made a game in one and a half week with javascript so i hope you enjoy.

Dragon Trail where you try to kill the dragon in the end of the trail in order to BRING PEACE!!!

This game is still unfinished mostly because i didn't wanted to continue.So it is fully opened for ideas and new stuff to add in to the mixture.

I hope you all enjoy as much as i enjoyed making it lol.
